text: We’re continuing with work to replace the gate on the #Foss Barrier in #York this week now that river levels have fallen. Here’s Mark explaining the latest plans to install the gate by the end of the week. https://t.co/i7onQwWAZx @CityofYork @EnvAgency @OliverHarmarEA https://t.co/aJgfHbsWpJ

text: Interesting to see the landscape being reshaped by the weather. This willow was damaged in storms in 2019.
